wsj.title: Federal Judge Stalls Obama’s Action on Immigration
wsj.topComment: 10th paragraph: Others supporting Mr. Obama’s executive order include a group of 12 states, including Washington and California, in addition to the District of Columbia. They filed a motion with Mr. Hanen in support of Mr. Obama, arguing the directiv...

wsj.title: Fans of CrossFit Brag About Extra Bulk
wsj.topComment: As a gym rat for 60+ years, I've seen many a fad come and go. Nothing beats self-discipline,  consistency, and balance between aerobic weight lifting. As a geezer (78) I've always preferred free weights.
